Summary: Witnessed fireball like object fly in hover and leave
divs: Sighting Details1. Four of us were in a hot tub when we saw the object. 2. Its brightness in the sky caught our attention. 3. it was extremely bright and moving fast. we thought it was an asteroid and the women ran into the house scared. When it stopped and hovered and glowed a bright white we knew it was no an asteroid. 4. It looked like an asteroid burning in the sky coming at us. The women ran into the house. The object stopped glowed bright white light. It then hovered for a few moments before changing directions and altitude from north to west. It was perfectly circular and flew away in an indescribably strange fashion until it disappeared in the western sky. 5. Immediate surprise followed by extreme fear and curiosity. 6. It flew in the distance in the westward sky and got smaller and smaller until it disappeared.
